thread.title: Subban, Pacioretty help Canadiens beat Leafs, improve to 9-0
thread.title_full: Subban, Pacioretty help Canadiens beat Leafs, improve to 9-0

title: Subban, Pacioretty help Canadiens beat Leafs, improve to 9-0
text:
> Sports Subban, Pacioretty help Canadiens beat Leafs, improve to 9-0 Montreal Canadiens' Brendan Gallagher (11) celebrates with teammate Andrei Markov after scoring against the Toronto Maple Leafs during the second period of an NHL hockey game in Montreal, Saturday, Oct. 24, 2015. (Graham Hughes/The Canadian Press via AP) MANDATORY CREDIT
